text: Once upon a time, in a sunny forest, there were happy animals...

title: Happy_Friends_in_Sunny_Meadow
text:
Happy Friends in Sunny Meadow

In a bright and sunny meadow, happy animals played together. A fluffy rabbit hopped with a butterfly. A little bird sang a happy song. A friendly squirrel shared his nuts with a hungry rabbit. They all smiled and said, "We are happy friends!" The end.
speaker: standard
